name: Blueriiot
0:
”Alexa, ask Blueriiot the water temperature”
”Alexa, ask Blueriiot how is my pool going”
”Alexa, ask Blueriiot the last measurement”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: blue riiot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The mobile app Blueriiot and Alexa skill help you to look after your pool 24/7, even if you are away.
Thanks to the Blueriiot skill, Alexa can tell your swimming pool water parameters (temperature, pH, ORP, conductivity, salinity) as well as required maintenance action.
The Blueriiot skill is intended for users of the Blueriiot mobile application.
For more information on Blueriiot : https://www.blueriiot.com/
